description: The French Pear Martini is a delicious cocktail that you can serve any time of the day. It has an elegant taste with a hint of sweet fruit and tangy yet smooth vodka. The martini is easy to make and will not take up too much time or effort from your busy schedule.
name: French Pear Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Using a lemon wedge to wet the rim of the glass, then dip the wet rim on superfine sugar.
recipeInstructions.text: Using a lemon wedge to wet the rim of the glass, then dip the wet rim on superfine sugar.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the elderflower liqueur and pear vodka into an ice-filled cocktail shaker.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour the elderflower liqueur and pear vodka into an ice-filled cocktail shaker.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake well, then strain into the glass.

recipeInstructions.name: Top with Champagne, then garnish with a lemon twist or pear slice.
